title: BRIEF-Lakshmi Vilas Bank Says Economic Offences Wing Registered FIR
text:
BRIEF-Lakshmi Vilas Bank Says Economic Offences Wing Registered FIR

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 26, 2019 20:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Lakshmi Vilas Bank Says Economic Offences Wing Registered FIR Sept 26 (Reuters) - Lakshmi Vilas Bank Ltd : * ECONOMIC OFFENCES WING REGISTERED FIR ON DIRECTORS OF BOARD LVB, DIRECTOR LVB, CONNAUGHT PLACE, NEW DELHI AMONGST OTHERS * FIR "FOR OFFENCES OF CHEATING, CRIMINAL BREACH OF TRUST, CRIMINAL MISAPPROPRIATION, CRIMINAL CONSPIRACY UNDER INDIAN PENAL CODE, 1860" * CONSIDERING APPROPRIATE LEGAL MEASURES TO COUNTER SAME * FIR BASED ON COMPLAINT FILED BY RELIGARE FINVEST PERTAINING TO ADJUSTMENT OF DEPOSITS TO DUES OF RHC HOLDING & RANCHEM

BRIEF-Lakshmi Vilas Bank Says Economic Offences Wing Registered FIR
description: BRIEF-Lakshmi Vilas Bank Says Economic Offences Wing Registered FIR
